content.detailedDescription: I was in the living room on the computer and my dog wanted to go to the backyard for a restroom break. when i went outside i looked up and saw a very low white cloudy vapor trail about 100 feet high above the house on a clear night.  i didn't hear any jet or airplane sounds.  i found it strange that a vapor trail was so low and i always thought this can only happen at very high altitudes.  so i went inside and grabbed my camera.  i wanted to capture the vapor trail but when i reviewed the picture, there was no vapor trail but instead a blue orb hovering above my house about 500 ft. this orb appeared to be glowing blue inside and blue white outside with rough edges, like a pulsating orb. i took several more pictures and it seem to have moved to left upper quadrant of the photo.  i took a couple more shots and the object disappeared.
content.summary: Took a photo using nikon d90 of a very low vapor trail about 100 feet above the house.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the living room on the computer and my dog wanted to go to the backyard for a restroom break. when i went outside i looked up and saw a very low white cloudy vapor trail about 100 feet high above the house on a clear night.  i didn't hear any jet or airplane sounds.  i found it strange that a vapor trail was so low and i always thought this can only happen at very high altitudes.  so i went inside and grabbed my camera.  i wanted to capture the vapor trail but when i reviewed the picture, there was no vapor trail but instead a blue orb hovering above my house about 500 ft. this orb appeared to be glowing blue inside and blue white outside with rough edges, like a pulsating orb. i took several more pictures and it seem to have moved to left upper quadrant of the photo.  i took a couple more shots and the object disappeared.
content.summary: Took a photo using nikon d90 of a very low vapor trail about 100 feet above the house.

content.detailedDescription: More then one siteing the first one was a multi colered orb and the next one was a guy in the middle of the sky on a white light trone and the next one was the land lord saw a golden beam of light over my house wow
content.summary: Orb just showed up and it was gone that fast/and a guy on a thron of light

content.detailedDescription: In the two photos. the blue craft is basically at rest. meandering a bit. the one showing a vast energy spectrum is zipping around.
content.summary: Additional to edmonton report - a couple of photos

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing ufo's in the skies over edmonton for the last month, just about every morning. on tues feb 21,2012 i arrived at work with my new hd night vision camcorder. i noticed lights moving in the sky over edmonton and shot some videos and still shots. i was on the east end of the city shooting to the west. when i previewed the attached video i thought that nothing was captured. however upon vieing it in a blacked out room on a large screen, i realized that the camera had captured what i saw.Attached is a video and a key sheet showing what is on the video and approximate run times. the ones marked with an "s" appear as blue-grey smudges moving around. don't dispair if you cannot see them as at 45 seconds there is a bright flash. this is eclipsed by a fast moving ufo at 1:00 minute. definitely visible. it starts traveling north to south at abou 200 mph. it jumps to about 2000 mph and starts to turn to the south east. it then jumps to about 4000 mph and i finally lose it behind a tower structure.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Exteme activity over edmonton

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8:00 p.M. at night, i was at home and outside when i noticed a very bright object out in the sky over the pacific ocean near santa catalina island.  it stood out much brighter than any other star and was varying in its intensity of light like a flame would.  at first i thought it might be the international space station but i don't think the sun's light would be reflecting off of it in the manner that it did and it was much too bright to be any star or planet.  as i continued to watch it over the next 45 minutes or so, it remained stationary for the entire time, so i knew it could not be a plane or helicopter and it did not have any blinking lights.  about 20 minutes after it started, it began to diminish in brightness and disappear completely of which i then noticed some kind of vapor cloud in the moonlit sky where it had been.  it then reappeared and grew in brightness until it became very bright again and then eventually disappeared completely.  just as it had disappeared for good, all of i sudden i see several miles across to the left of where it had been, a very large "arc" of light appeared like a giant flame had just erupted and then went out completely to be replaced by a blinking object which then started to travel right in the direction of where the first object had appeared.  it moved slowly until it went past the first object's position completely and onward and of which this object did appear to be a plane or helicopter.  i did witness several helicopters or planes over the pacific ocean in the area when this was happening.  i don't know if any of them were just passing through or were actually "following" this object(s).  i have seen these "flaming stars" in the past looking westward out over the pacific ocean before and cannot explain what they are.
content.summary: Very bright flaming object out over pacific ocean pulsating then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i had driven out to upper lake mary, around 10:15pm.  we parked on the side of the road, facing south.  out of the corner of my eye, i saw what first appeared to be a bright star to the west of us.  when we first parked, it was blocked by the top of a tree, but it caught my attention when it seemed to get brighter.

i focused my attention on the object and it noticeably moved from side to side horizontally.  the object's movements would change, first just sitting stationary, then drifting back and forth horizontally, with the occasional bob vertically.  it didn't move particularly fast, but the movements seemed erratic.

we originally considered that it might be a helicopter or a small plane, since the flagstaff airport was close by and in the same general direction, but there were no other lights on the object and the movements seemed too odd for a conventional aircraft.  the object itself was bright white, and glowing like a star.  there were no other colors of light, nor any blinking or pulsing.

i suggested it might be some sort of kite with a light on it, since the movements of the object seemed restrained, like a kite would in a strong wind.  we also considered a laser or spotlight beam, but there was no tail to the light and the cloud cover was very light.  in addition, the light seemed to come from the object, and was not a reflection.

any other ideas i had that it might have been something tethered to the ground disappeared when we pulled back onto lake mary road and started to head back to flagstaff, around 10:30pm.  from where we were parked, the light seemed to be over lower lake mary, so we figured we'd get closer to it as we drove down the lake.

however, as we drove further west, the light seemed to first maintain a distance away from us, then seemed to pick up speed and slowly drift away.  it got smaller and smaller, and i eventually lost sight of it as we entered more heavily populated residential areas.  the combination of the distance, as well as the added lights from the streetlamps made keeping an eye on it nearly impossible.  i lost sight of it around 10:40pm.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like object sighted over lower lake mary.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch with the lights on at around 12:50 a.M. i saw a flash in the sky and it registered in my mind that stars do not flash. i watched it for a few moments longer and realized these lights were not moving at all. therefore, i knew it could not be a plane. i turned off my porch lights to try and get a better look at the lights. at this time i noticed a very faint disk like shape around the light, and a second smaller light that did not flash. the smaller light was only visible for a brief moment and then it disappeared, but the flashing light could still be seen. the flashing light would change from a white, to a dark red, to a red-orange color. the flashes at times seemed occur sequentially, but would occasionally flash randomly. the fact that the lights never moved at all tells me this could not have been a plane because planes are incapable of remaining still. i knew it could not be a star because stars to not flash. i also do not believe it was a helicopter because it would make sense for a helicopter to remain in the exact same place that long. i got frightened after watching for about ten minutes. i have no idea what this object was or what it could have been. i am a strong believer in extra-terrestrial life, and that seems to be the only explanation to what i saw.
content.summary: Two lights. one flashing. completely stationary. faint disk shape around lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My son i and have taken a trip from iowa to the lake mead recreation area near bullhead city, arizona. we are camping at the katherines landing location which is north of davis dam and about 6 miles north of bullhead city, az. we arrived here on the 27th of january and are still here as of submission of this report.

being amateur star gazers we have taken advantage of the excellant conditions for night sky viewing on several occasions using a telescope. many times at night while moving about the campsite, my son, myself or both of us will take a few minutes to observe the night sky with the naked eye. on one night in particular, during the early morning hours of tuesday, february 21 at approximately 12:30 a.M. mst i had just finished some chores before going to bed. since it was a clear, moonless night i decided to take a few minutes to view the sky before sleeping. while scanning the sky i noticed a light at approximately 10 degrees above the mountain horizon a few degrees east of north. the light was a significant distance from my location, estimating it to be at least 15 to 20 miles away as if you were viewing a distant aircraft beacon. it looked mostly red with a little white-ish component and had a radiant variance. at first i thought it to be nothing more than a common aircraft one would see at night accounting the radiant variance to be the effect of low angle viewing. the light did not strobe on and off as do most aircraft. appearing to be stationary for the short time, maybe 20 to 30 seconds of viewing, i made the determination it was not a star or planet. then to my surprise the light moved upward a few degrees then back down to it's original position in maybe 4 to 5 seconds at the most. thinking this to be odd it now had my full attention since to move that amount from the distance i was viewing meant it had to be traveling at a significant velocity as well stop and start. continuing to watch, approximately 20 seconds later the light moved again in the same upward direction at the same speed as before but this time it came downward in a slight arcing diaganol ending up just east of its original position by the width of about a fifth of its upward movement at the same position above the horizon. a couple of seconds later it moved to the left(west) traveling at the same rate of speed it went upward going approximately 3 times the distance that it had traveled upward, stopped and came back to its original position at a slightly faster speed. as it remained stationary i ran to my vehicle to grab a set of binoculars for a closer look and to tell my son, who was also in the vehicle using his laptop computer at the time, about what i had observed. hurrying back with my son the light was still in the same location. i viewed it through the binoculars. the image was larger than with the naked eye but still quite small. the light now looked to be composed of three colors. blue on top, white-ish in the center and red on the bottom but not well defined as the image was still too small for more detail. i gave my son the binoculars to view it. while he looked for about half a minute the light moved again this time to the right(east). it appeared to move at the same speed and distance as it had done to the west and came back to its original position with the abrupt stops at each end of its travel. this event is now about 10 minutes into it and having witnessed a couple more times of the up-down, side-to-side movements with the exception of one east back to west movement, in which the travel back was a wave-like motion. deciding to get yet a closer look, i left my son with the binoculars to keep an eye on it and went to my tent to get our telescope. i set up the telescope and sighted in the light while it was stationary. the image was larger than the binocular view and now the colors more defined but no detail of a craft. could now see definite blue light radiating from the top third, a white-ish yellow light in the middle that radiated less than a third part and the remaining bottom part which was more than a third as a bright red. the telescope image gave better detail of the light. it was very intense with a variable radiance, spherical with no defined outside edge, just fuzzy or almost intensly sun-like radiant. we're now about 20 minutes into this experience when the light starts an upward ascension at a slower rate of speed than what we previosly observed, slow enough that i could make fast enough adjustments to keep it in the eyepiece. the ascension required equatorial adjustments to the east until reaching approximately a 45 degree angle to the horizon in which it disappeared or i lost track of it in the night sky. total time of sighting lasted approximately 35 to 40 minutes.
content.summary: Observed unusual movements and lights from object through naked eye, binocular and telescope viewing.

content.detailedDescription: Hundred
content.summary: Balcony smoking

content.detailedDescription: I was outside playing for a while as i hear a loud buzzing and vibration. as i look up i see a triangular object overhead and it was a grey/black color and looked very unusual compared to human built objects. i though it may be a military shuttle or something, but it was very unusual, it dashed overhead then stopped hovering for about 5 minutes but as the helicopters showed up it started to leave and at lightning speed dashed off leaving a trail of what i thought may be smoke. after i saw it i fell alittle woosy and got a minor headache but it vanished quickly. i lost contact as soon as it flew off.
content.summary: Medium size triangular shuttle flew overhead and sat still for about 5 min. then took off and while it was a few copters showed up.

content.detailedDescription:
I was fly fishing for summer bass one night at my favorite spot.  i fish here often.  there is one small, unoccupied cabin on the pond.  an undeveloped old logging access road cuts through a very steep mountain side.  there is swamp that turns into a valley, more mountains a mile or two in the distance to the west.  there is on occasion a house light about a mile or more away on a mountain top that is visible on nights without fog and a radio tower about half that distance with multiple red and hot white lights that blink regularly (to the sw).  

it was a very clear and quiet night, though it is always quiet.  it was between the hours of 10pm-1am.  it was so clear that the moon illuminated the earth around me - i didn't need my headlamp.  the pond is so remote you can not hear or see any car traffic/lights from this spot.  air traffic is not regular, but not uncommon.

i was paddling across the pond to the side away from the road, traveling nw when i saw in my peripheral vision, from the north a light in the sky.  i stopped paddling to take a look.

the light was bright round-orb like, hot blue and white - star like - about four times as bright as polaris.  it almost looked like an electric fire, incredibly hot colored pulsating light-but not in frequency, but in the color.  it had no tail, trail indicating its flight path.  it appeared from the north, over the trees on the horizon .  it seemed high in the sky, similar to that of a high flying military plane. it made a sweeping arc southward.  it appeared to be slowing as it moved across the sky.  it was almost at the peak of the dome that it came to an abrupt stop.  this thing was still moving at considerable speed, then bam! just stopped.  i was looking right up at it, head cocked back wondering "how the hell did that stop - looks like it hit a wall in the sky".  it stayed there for a second, maybe two and vanished.  it just wasn't there.  this took about a half minute, maybe less.  no sound, not a thing else and it was just gone.

i was awe struck, sitting in my little canoe looking up at the sky.  when i went home, about 45 minutes later the gravity of what i could've seen really hit me.  i felt anxious - an i was afraid.  i don't know what i saw.  i just know i saw something and that is what was most frightening to me: no explanation.
i don't drink when i fish and i am very responsible and consider myself a safe and reasonable human being.
content.summary: Observation of unknown light at remote maine pond

content.detailedDescription: About eight forty heading to my car notice a bright light out of the corner of my eye stopped looked to get a good look and two lights appeared at the same time moving to the south west i called for my family to check it out as they dimmed out a few seconds later five light in sequence came on seemed to be attached to one object moving in the same direction as before they stopped and hoovered for a few seconds and never came back then we notice a few white flashing lights coming out of the west had to be jets moved way faster than any commercial airline and lower in the horizon circled in the location of the lights and headed back in the direction they came checked my phone it was eight forty five
content.summary: Flashing sequentially

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a party when i saw a flash of light from an airplane, i looked up and saw a circle darker than the night without clouds.Later on that night i felt a hand on my leg.I woke up and saw two short human-like entities. they're eyes were huge and almond shaped, they had big heads and four fingers on each hand.I was so scared.I had a sudden feeling to say "don't go."
two years later i was sleeping when i heard a noise like a bird picking at my window.I looked up and saw another human-like entity.I was so scared i couldn't move. several days later my friend and i were playing later than usual and when is was dark there was giant ring of light hovering over my house. my friends dad was fixing a truck. he had a flashlight facing upward so we though it was the flashlight. we turned it off and the ring was still on.
content.summary: The ufo was following an airplane then disappeared out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a party when i saw a flash of light from an airplane, i looked up and saw a circle darker than the night without clouds.Later on that night i felt a hand on my leg.I woke up and saw two short human-like entities. they're eyes were huge and almond shaped, they had big heads and four fingers on each hand.I was so scared.I had a sudden feeling to say "don't go."
two years later i was sleeping when i heard a noise like a bird picking at my window.I looked up and saw another human-like entity.I was so scared i couldn't move. several days later my friend and i were playing later than usual and when is was dark there was giant ring of light hovering over my house. my friends dad was fixing a truck. he had a flashlight facing upward so we though it was the flashlight. we turned it off and the ring was still on.
content.summary: The ufo was following an airplane then disappeared out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my patio early in the morning before work.  i was looking down at my phone, when a bright light caught my eye in the sky.  bright enough to bring my attention away from my bright phone.  there were some clouds in the sky, minimal and fast moving, my initial thought was that it was an airplane.  i knew there were no stars that large, and no stars that bright in that part of the sky.

since i thought it was an airplane, i was waiting for the small puff of cloud to move out of the way, or expected to see it on the other side of the cloud.  this did not happen.  instead, the bright white light faded as if it were moving away.  after the cloud moved, there was nothing at all in the sky except for stars.  right after it faded, i heard a dog barking uncontrollably.  it was from a dog that i do not usually hear barking.  i heard it's owner outside trying to calm it down.  i was still looking up at the sky, and i saw a "shooting star" beam across the sky coming from the point of where the bright light faded.  after this happened, the dog stopped barking.

the object was a bright white light that i noticed large, then become smaller as if it was moving away.

i felt perplexed by this event, as i am familiar with what airplanes look like around here (usually very high up and i can see the standard blinking lights).  i am also an avid sky watcher, and have seen many meteors in my life.  i can't say this one looked different, but the series of events made me question it.

i lost sight of the object because it faded, or... went back to outer space.
content.summary: Bright light appearing, then slowly disappearing, streak across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: One morning, about 3 years ago (i do not remember the exact date, but it was about 2 days after a meteorological phenomenon that causes the moon to appear orange with an aura, and it was cold and still dark when i woke up),i woke up for work around 5 am. i always go outside first thing to have a cigarette and let the dog out. i looked up because i like to see the stars when the city lights aren't so bright, and there isn't much else to do that early in the morning when you are just outside to have a cigarette. i saw a very large object directly over my next-door neighbor's house and partially over my back yard. it appeared to be very low, maybe 100 feet or so, just high enough to clear the oak trees in my yard. at that distance, it appeared to be between 60 and 150 feet across at it's widest point. our lots are about 60 feet wide and it seemed to cover my next-door neighbor's house, part of my yard, and part of the neighbor on the other side of my next-door neighbor's house. it made no noise. it didn't even bother the dog, she paid no attention to it. it looked like a triangle, based on the three bright white lights that seemed to be on the corners. the lights did not seem to actually illuminate anything. my yard remained dark. i don't know how to describe the surface except to say that it was not a reflection of anything, but at the same time, it didn't appear to be a solid surface. it looked more like a projection of the night-sky above it,including cloud movement, looking up from underneath. it moved very slowly, impossibly slowly. i watched as it moved even more slowly than a person can walk. i almost thought i was seeing things. i went inside to get another cigarette, figuring that if it was gone when i came back out, i had just imagined it, or something. when i came back out only a second or two later (i kept my cigarettes right by the back door)it was still there, still moving at the same pace. so i kept watching it. honestly, i can't remember seeing it actually go away. i watched it for so long that i think i got tired of watching and went inside to take my shower and get ready for work, though in retrospect, i can't imagine why i didn't keep watching until it was gone, or why i didn't try to take a picture, or even why i didn't wake up my husband. i didn't even tell him when he did wake up because i guess i thought it sounded crazy. but i just kept thinking, "i saw it. i know i saw it." i finally did tell my husband a couple of months later, and my closest friend maybe a year ago. we don't really discuss it. i have never told anyone else, but i can't let go of the experience. that it happened, i have no doubt. what exactly it was, i have no idea. i am only sharing because it continues to creep into my thoughts to this day, and i thought that maybe my experience might have some value as a record of similar experiences or maybe be consistent with other reports in the same area, around the same time.
content.summary: Early one morning before daybreak, i saw a huge triangle shaped object just overhead.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from the super bowl party when out the window, me and my family saw 5 or 6 yellow orange lights in the sky. i don't know how long they were there, but they were stationary. i didn't know what the were, my mom thought they were just hot air balloons, but like i said, they were stationary. i lost sight of it because we drove away .
content.summary: They were yellow orange lights that stayed in place

content.detailedDescription: My family and i traveled to dublin tx from strawn for a girls play-off basketball game and arrived 25 minutes early.  it was like 6:35 pm and we had all just gotten out of the car.  when we started to head to the gymnasium doors we both heard a jetlike humming noise and i looked up and pointed out to my husband what were four very bright lights and said, "stars during the day".  he looked up at them and said yeah we looked at one another like no. then the top left one disappeared first and the others right behind it along with the noise.  we were floored.  we've heard what people say they have seen and now we're part of it.  when we entered the gym the lady taking our money i was assuming was a local so i told her and she didn't look at us like we were crazy at all.  her exact words were, "i know people who have seen them too but i have to witness it".  then my husband told a friend of his walking in and with the response he got we vowed not to say another word about it for that time being.  since we have called kstv radio station and asked if anyone else out there saw this to to please call in and got no response.  so that leaves me here searching on the web and reading a sighting in the same area the same night only and hour later than ours.  it is exciting! thank you for letting us share our story and see what others are seeing out there!
content.summary: Four bright lights in the shape of a parollelogram were sitting stationary for a few seconds then one disappeared and after the first one disappeared the others vanished immediately after it.  what made us look into the sky was a jetlike noise or hum.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and her friend and i were walking along clearwater beach, just north of the pier just before midnight on february 4th, 2012 when i turned around to take a picture of them with the pier in the background. i noticed a "reddish-orange flaming ball-shaped" object in the sky to the south of us. at first we thought it might be a plane or helicopter due to the speed, except that it was not blinking, and it changed course, similar to the shape of a question mark, as it headed from east to west from over land to over the water.  after we had observed it had gone west enough that it was just past the pier, (as a point of reference) it suddenly shot straight through the clouds and disappeared. 

living in florida for 12 years and working for delta airlines, i am fairly familiar with the flight patterns of take-off and landings from tampa international airport, and the clearwater/st. pete airport. i do not believe this object followed what i would consider a typical flight pattern due to the change of course, and the speed it used to accelerate into the atmosphere. 

it was cloudy that night, but not completely overcast, and the object was clearly visible below the clouds until it sped away, never to be seen again. if it was a plane, it would have followed a course in an arc pattern back towards land. 

it did not seem to have any particular emissions other than the glow of what look like flames that enveloped it.

i believe in ufo's and hope this instance isn't my eyes playing tricks on me.
content.summary: Reddish-orange ball of flames, not blinking, changed direction then shot straight out into the atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: i had just got off work from the hospital i worked at.  it was about 7:30 p.M.  i was on hwy 376 heading to statenville when this huge ufo was coming out of the sky as if it was gonna land on the road.  so the lady in front of and her son pulled over just as i did, and we got out of the car and went to run up the ditch and about that time it got tree top level and vanished in thin air. it was not dark yet and between each light that as really bright you could see the sky. when it left we watch stuff falling on the ground it looked metalic like  and i had a pair of latex gloves in my truck so i went over and picked some of this stuff up and put it inside a zaxbys bag that i had from lunch in my truck. i just kept it.  i stll have it.
content.summary: It was coming down like it was gonna land on hwy. 376 and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from the gas station in my car to a friend's apartment. as i turned west on sea cliff drive i noticed a bright star-like object glowing white at a forty-five degree angle from where i was. the object was of similar size to a grain of rice held at arms length and thus larger than a normal star or planet. i immediately stopped the car but was unable totake a picture before the object vanished. attempting to regain visual contact with the object i continued driving in hopes of catching another angle but could not.
content.summary: Brief appearance, around 10 seconds, of bright star-like object to the west over the water which then subsequently vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the event i was walking down the street towards a friend's house after a fight with my girlfriend in a coastal suburb 50km north of the perth city center. 
i noticed a blue coloured light in the sky which was when i started to record the event as i felt it was an abnormal thing to be happening. at first it appeared to be similar to a star, but i had no idea what it was which is why i used my iphone 4 to record the event.
the light then descended from high in the sky to the left to much lower and started to change colour, the outer rim of the object changed colour first and echoed into the center. i noticed two other people in the same area as me standing outside looking at the same object. 
the object then darts around and hovers, going through multiple colour changes for about 30 seconds. the object seemed to pause while changing colour or direction. 
i was in an angry and frustrated state before, during and after the sighting. the sighting did not affect my feelings at the time, it was not until reviewing the footage and recalling the event that i really questioned what happened, questions that multiply with every viewing of the footage, questions that seemingly have no answers. 
i was walking during the sighting and as the object started to re-ascend back to where it came from outside my field of vision i had turned a corner and arrived at my destination.
content.summary: Desends in view, changing colours, hovers around and asends and appers to realse a second flying object.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, in september or october 1982, i went outside of my parents house to go see my sister who was babysitting up the road. i was  17 at the time. we lived in a rural area and could see all the stars, so, like always, i looked up  and soon realized that a portion of the stars were blocked out. i soon realized that there were "four stars",very far apart, rotating in a circle hovering right above me and slightly to my left. there was no sound. i called out to my mother, but she couldn't see it. i felt it was probably as big as a football field, but i'm not sure how close it was to me and the black part was not really something one could see, it was just blocking the stars, so i realized that it was a large rectangular object with a light at each corner, about as bright as the stars.  my mother asked me if i was still going up the road, but i wasn't sure, because now i was scared. she went back in the house. i think it could read my mind or intentions, because the split second before i made the decision to go, it moved over the road and waited for me. as i walked and ran up the road, the object moved ahead of me,or to my right, but stayed very close. it was like it was escorting me to where i was going. when i was about one house from my sister, it moved over the house where she was and hovered spinning over the back door. this was the door everyone used, but how would it know that, unless it could read my intentions. i went inside to get her, but when we came out, it was gone. i have never seen it since.
i was instantly aware it was a ufo and i really feel, it meant me no harm.
to this day, my mother has no recollection of me even asking her out to view this object.
content.summary: Rectangular ufo over my driveway.

content.detailedDescription: looks like a twinkling star, but to detail, as in shape it formed,as circle, but not complete circle like drawn. points as a star on christmas tree, like jewish star and staying all lighted up, but also flickering, like more code and changed colors a few times, from silver,white to light gold and green and blue and one time i see maybe glimpse,of red and only one time. then about 7:00 look as some thing shot out and left quick streak, like shooting star almost, but not really visible and bright and dissipated as it was, like it was not to be noticed, but dissipation, was more like to be invisible. seemed to move ever so slight to the left, but eyes have tendencys to play tricks on us and it is on course of may going distant, but it would have to move away as the naked eye could not tell it was moving. still way bigger than any star ever seen and to much detail ad the lights that stay on and the extra flicker and say twinkle, not so much as star twinkle as the detail to visible as in detail of lights. then seen similar like shooting star at 11:00 position and it dissipated not like shooting star and went further, but not a steak, like the fist one, was like a streak, but not like shooting stars.I was looking s,west- s,s,west toward south good year az. :state : i was in avondale and close to chandler,good year. the object looks about 1:00 in sky and horizon, i would say, as looking on a clock would be 12:00 and not up there with the stars. so maybe horizon?  i left post on [links moved to fi section/cms/tg] < better detail story earlier as this happen 02/22/2012 at 1230am and until i stopped looking at 1:00 am or so. to cold and concrete and socks on,no shoes. oh building was over head of my view of this and i was lining up this star like, but not like a star, "detail to much" , and it stayed in line with top of square of bldg, but seemed it may have went distant, but still hug he and visible detail and morse code flash and then not but still brightness of flash and twinkle lights. was wanting to continue to watch, as for movement or change of some thing or dis pear or some thing, but i seen a good one 24 years ago, that answered me with out a doubt. so this to me, just unknown.
content.summary: Looks as if a hughe star, bigger and brighter than any star twinkeling and a circle form, as in if you had a jewish star on your chrismas tree and the lights stayed on bright, but distant and they would get brighter and apear to change from the silver .

content.detailedDescription: Esta foto la tome en la ciudad de medellin y solo me di cuenta de la presencia del objeto cuando la pase al computador, la verdad estaba de paso por la ciudada de medellin y tome la foto a la torre coltejer con un telefono blackberry curve.
content.summary: Ovni medellin

content.detailedDescription:
I have 3 cell phone photos that i will send upon finding the  required cable to down load from my cell phone. amasing photos but blurry as the object is very far away when i took the pictures. the photos are pretty amazing to me as they were not that visable with the naked eye. it looked like a string of 4 to 5 lights on a horizontal plane that tilted back as it moved west as it was over my gated subdivison called filinvest 2 about 2 km from the batasan congressional building complex in northern quezon city , metro manila. the oblect of lights was traveling from the east to the west very slowly. it seemed like a sigle white light in the photos  at original (no zoom ) setting but when full zoomed in it became a green saucer shaped object with a light bar under it. one close up  is white in color and the bars below is  yellow and green . 
this event started at approximately 8pm manila time on 22 february and passed over the horizon out of sight by 8:25 pm . as i type this report my heart has finally stopped pounding as it was so wild to see this as my 2 house maids was able to help me confirm what i was seeing with my not so good eyes. i have had a operation in boston ear and eye clinic some years ago to remove a catarac and install a replacement plastic lens in my left eye. my right eye is bad as it requires a plastic contact lens at -5 power.  this lens is usually not so clear by 8pm from the air polution we have to endure every day here. i tried to get a video camera from our bedroom but it was too late as the objects were already to far away. i have never seen anything like this as they 4 to 5 white lights were in line. if i had to make a distance estimate from me when i first sighted it i will say it was maybe more than 5 miles away at a angle to the surface of maybe 15 degrees.  as it slowely moved away it may have been 8 to 9 miles away and down to an angle of less than 8 degrees from the horizon. the enlarged picture are from this object and i never saw the 5 lights in a line in the zoom mode of the cell camera. im a beliver they are around us and im now more than excited to share what we saw as i have my two house maids who was there to see it also.
content.summary: I was on  the cell phone from the balcony of our house  about 8pm. i saw what looked like a string of 4 to 5 white lights in a straight horizontal line stationary...

content.detailedDescription: This sighting is being reported by investigator beverly trout, as related to trout by the witness to des moines, iowa case no. 35820.  sighting actually occurred in taylorsville, utah, probably about september 10, 2005, at around 9:00 p.M. with other witnesses also present and acknowledging what was seen.  object was seen at 80-85 degrees elevation.  itwas silent and appeared to be in shape of large capital v, as it headed south, at possibly 15,000-17,000 feet altitude.  witness indicates it was clear night and he could see stars in the sky, but his attention was drawn by his change in depth perception, and then he saw that the bottom of the object showed the stars that should have been beyond and above the object.  his terminology was that he wondered if it was some kind of cloaking.
content.summary: Large silent capital v shape headed south, had no lights and appeared cloaked so that underside looked like stars above it.
